dmca.title: Internet Archive Asked to Remove Archives of "Nuremburg Files" Website
dmca.body:
In early 2004 a request was made to the Internet Archive to remove sites from the Wayback Machine which contained controversial content including the "Nuremberg Files" on www.christiangallery.com and www.abortioncams.com.  A 9th Circuit court of Appeals opinion which declared use of the content by the site owners constituted a "true threat".   It is the case of Planned Parenthood v The American Coalition of Life Activists,  99-35320/25/27/31.  The complete opinion can be found here: http://www.ca9.uscourts.gov/ca9/newopinions.nsf/Opinions%20by%20date?OpenView&Start=1&Count=100&Expand=4.8#4.8 
it was published on May 16, 2002.

Internet Archive excluded the sites from the Wayback Machine.
